conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a dance movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.text: I'd highly recommend watching "Armageddon" if you're in the mood for a dance movie, as it might not be a dance movie per se but offers an exciting storyline with a stellar cast including Bruce Willis and Ben Affleck. If you prefer something more centered around dance, "Afterlife" could be a great choice as it revolves around a young man who starts to see his father's ghost, and they bond over dance in a unique way. Enjoy the movies!

The film stars Chris Klein, Dennis Quaid, and Mandy Moore, and it explores the world of reality TV competition shows. If you're looking for a more artistic and thought-provoking film, "Alex in Wonderland" might be right up your alley. This movie features Jeanne Moreau, Paul Mazursky, and Ellen Burstyn and delves into the life of a director juggling commercial success and artistic control. Enjoy!
